name: The Highway Story
description:
This is a short slice of life about a teenager and their mom stuck in a car for a few hours...

——————————

The game can have a feel good vibes as much as a tiny bit sad one, depending on your choices.

——————————

This was mostly an experiment for me. I wanted to toy with the variables and the CSS, as this is my first solo Ink project!

The game might evolve in the future, as some paths are too short to my taste.
If you see anything strange, drop me a comment!

The length will depend on your choices, some paths are longer than others.
Average gameplay time ~5 minutes
The game has 11 endings.

PS: did you see some lit memes?
